street_name: Barrhill Road, Blairderry Road And Ardwell Road
description: Redevelopment of the site involving demolition of the existing buildings and the construction of a building of 3 - 6 storeys in height (plus basement) to provide 66 residential units and 379sqm of commercial floorspace (Flexible Use including Class A2 or B1), underground parking for 20 spaces with access onto Blairderry Road, associated landscaping and servicing.
